pylapp.tapster.client.android.networks

Interface HttpClientStub

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OkHttpHttpClientSkeleton

    public HttpClientStub

    Stub based on design pattern Bridge which provides the declarations of methods to call so as to deal with HTTP requests.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object commandDance(HttpClientStub.HttpClientCallback callback)
      Sends a command through HTTP and returns the result. Here the command is a "dance" command.

      Sends a command through HTTP and returns the result. Here the command is a "draw circle" command.

      • commandDrawRandomPattern

        java.lang.Object commandDrawRandomPattern(int n,
                                          int minWidth,
                                          int minHeight,
                                          int maxWidth,
                                          int maxHeight,
                                          HttpClientStub.HttpClientCallback callback)

        Sends a command through HTTP and returns the result. Here the command is a "draw random pattern" command.

        Parameters:
        n -

        • The number of main points to use, to draw n-1 strokes

        minWidth -

        • One of the corner of the area where will be drawn the pattern

        minHeight -

        • One of the corner of the area where will be drawn the pattern

        maxWidth -

        • One of the corner of the area where will be drawn the pattern

        maxHeight -

        • One of the corner of the area where will be drawn the pattern

        callback -

        • A callback to trigger if needed

        Returns:
        Any? - Something if suitable
